document.full_text: apple has completed work on an online music storage service and is set to launch it ahead of google, whose own music efforts have stalled, according to several people familiar with both companies' plans.
document.title: apple set to beat google on cloud music: sources
lines_and_colors: apple has completed work on an online music storage service and is set to launch it ahead of google, whose own music efforts have stalled, according to several people familiar with both companies' plans.
